# PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions

**Structure**

Options for the semantic use and display style of icons for badging Live Photo assets, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/livePhotoBadgeImage(options:)] method.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PHLivePhotoBadgeOptions
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates Live Photo badge options from a raw value.

## Constants

- **liveOff**: Return an icon for identifying assets whose additional Live Photo content is disabled.
- **overContent**: Return a variant icon for use on a variable background such as an animating Live Photo view.

## Constants

- **PHLivePhotoViewPlaybackStyle**: Options for how much of the motion and sound content of a Live Photo to play, used in the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/startPlayback(with:)] method and in messages to the view’s [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHLivePhotoView/delegate] object.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
